includedAssets.title: Secrets That I Never Want To Know
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep1 - Secrets That I Never Want To Know
includedAssets.synopsis: After helping Carlos conceal his crime, guilt weighs heavily on Susan, Gabrielle, Bree and Lynette; Tom and Lynette's marriage continues to disintegrate; Renee pursues a sexy new neighbor.

includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep2 - Making The Connection

includedAssets.title: Season 8
includedAssets.synopsis: In the eighth and final season of the smash-hit drama series, the housewives attempt to cover up a murder. Teri Hatcher, Felicity Huffman, Marcia Cross and Eva Longoria star.

includedIn.title: Desperate Housewives
includedIn.synopsis: Four suburban housewives find their lives taking a shocking turn when their friend and neighbour unexpectedly commits suicide. But her tragic death turns out to be just the start of a string of shadowy and salacious goings-on on Wisteria Lane.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Four housewives' lives are devastated when their friend commits suicide, but that's just the start of a string of shocking events on Wisteria Lane.
